task.title: Directions to Shanks Hall from Campus

context.p: Students or faculty that are wishing to take advantage the services that AirClassroom provides can access Shanks Hall from campus extrememly easily. Shanks Hall is easiest to access via Alumni Mall but can also be accessed by way of Turner St. and North Main St.

step.cmd: Beginning at Alumni Mall, walk in the direction moving away from Newman Library and Torgesen Bridge towards downtown Blacksburg.
Turn left at the staircase before Moss Arts Center.
Follow the stairs and concrete path up to the Upper Quad.
Walk straight towards Shanks Hall and its sign will be visible.
